# This Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>. ## A sub heading Formatting 1. this 2. that and - this - that and *this* and **this** and ***this*** and ![label text](/../assets/img/1.jpg "more text") ## Math Latex is like this: $$x = \frac{1}{2^{17}}$$ ## Code When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this: ```{r} 1 + 1 ``` You can add options to executable code like this ```{r} #| echo: false 2 * 2 ``` The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed). ## Heading - som
